metadata.description: The id of the Application Insights resource
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

variables.workbookDataTemplate:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Industrial IoT Diagnostics
"},"name":"text - 7"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"12e24ac4-d5f3-42ec-9c32-118fd5438150","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange","type":4,"isRequired":true,"value":{"durationMs":172800000},"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":300000},{"durationMs":900000},{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":14400000},{"durationMs":43200000},{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":172800000},{"durationMs":259200000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":1209600000},{"durationMs":2419200000},{"durationMs":2592000000},{"durationMs":5184000000},{"durationMs":7776000000}]}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 6"},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Overview","subTarget":"Overview","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Edge Modules","subTarget":"Edge","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Services (AKS only)","subTarget":"Service","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"App Insights","subTarget":"AppInsights","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - 5"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "iiot_edge_publisher_messages"
| extend guid_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).runid)
| summarize msg_sent = max(tolong(Value_d)) by guid_
| summarize messages = sum(msg_sent)","size":4,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Messages sent from Publisher to IotHub","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"messages","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"gray","linkColumn":"messages","linkIsContextBlade":true},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":false}}},"showBorder":false,"size":"auto"}},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"showPin":true,"name":"query - 0"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let max_timestamp = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "iiot_edge_publisher_exceptions"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project timestamp = TimeGenerated 
| limit 1;
let publisher_exceptions = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "iiot_edge_publisher_exceptions" and TimeGenerated == toscalar(max_timestamp)
| extend type_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).type) 
| extend source_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).source) 
| extend stacktrace_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).stacktrace) 
| project TimeGenerated, type_ , source_ , count_of_exceptions = tolong(Value_d), stacktrace_;
publisher_exceptions
| summarize sum(count_of_exceptions) ","size":4,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Exception Count","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"sum_count_of_exceptions","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"coldHot"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":false}}},"showBorder":false,"size":"auto"}},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"showPin":true,"name":"query - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let uptime_table = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s startswith "iiot_edge_module_start"
| extend module_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).module)
| extend device_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).deviceid)
| extend guid_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).guid)
| extend version_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).version)
| extend start_time_utc = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).timestamp_utc)
| extend agent = strcat(module_, device_)
| summarize count(Value_d) by agent, module_, device_, guid_, version_, start_time_utc
| sort by agent, start_time_utc asc
| extend rn=row_number(1, prev(agent) != agent)
| partition by agent (top 1 by start_time_utc desc)
| extend up_since_hrs = now() - todatetime(start_time_utc)
| project module = module_ , device = device_ , version = version_, up_since_hrs, restarts = rn ;
uptime_table","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Module Uptime","timeContext":{"durationMs":3600000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":4,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"aggregation":"Count"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}],"filter":true},"sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"showBorder":false},"graphSettings":{"type":0},"mapSettings":{"locInfo":"LatLong"}},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"showPin":true,"name":"query - 1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"
let max_records_sent = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "iiot_edge_publisher_messages_duration_count"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project message_count = Value_d
| limit 1;
let aggregated_publisher_data = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s startswith "iiot_edge_publisher_messages_duration_"
| extend time_taken_less_than = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).le) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name_s , time_taken_less_than
| extend total_messages = toscalar(max_records_sent)
| where time_taken_less_than != "" and time_taken_less_than != "+Inf"
| extend less_than_millisec_taken = todouble(time_taken_less_than) * 1000
| extend percent_of_messages = todouble(Value_d) * 100 / toint(total_messages)
| where percent_of_messages < 99.99 and percent_of_messages > 50
| project percent_of_messages , less_than_millisec_taken
| order by percent_of_messages desc;
aggregated_publisher_data","size":1,"aggregation":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Time taken for publishing (percentile)","color":"orange","timeContext":{"durationMs":3600000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":4,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}],"filter":true},"sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"showBorder":false},"graphSettings":{"type":0},"chartSettings":{"xSettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}},"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":23,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}}},"mapSettings":{"locInfo":"LatLong","sizeSettings":"percent_of_messages","sizeAggregation":"Sum","legendMetric":"percent_of_messages","legendAggregation":"Sum","itemColorSettings":{"type":"heatmap","colorAggregation":"Sum","nodeColorField":"percent_of_messages","heatmapPalette":"greenRed"}}},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Edge"},"showPin":true,"name":"query - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"promMetrics_CL
| where  Name_s startswith "iiot_edge"  and Name_s endswith "reconnected" and Name_s !contains "device" 
| extend module = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).module) 
| extend device = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).device) 
//| summarize Count = max(Value_d)  by Name_s, module, device 
| project TimeGenerated, strcat(device ,"-", module ,"-", Name_s) , toint(Value_d)   
| render timechart

promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s startswith "iiot_edge_publisher_monitored_items"
| extend subscription_id = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).subscription)

| extend source_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).source) 
| extend agent_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).agent)

| extend stacktrace_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).stacktrace)

| project TimeGenerated, type_ , source_ , count_of_exceptions = tolong(Value_d), custom_message_, agent_, stacktrace_

| extend percent_of_messages = todouble(Value_d) * 100 / toint(total_messages)
| where percent_of_messages < 99.99 and percent_of_messages > 50

aggregated_twin_browse_data","size":0,"aggregation":1,"title":"Time taken to browse nodes (percentile)","color":"red","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart","chartSettings":{"xSettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}},"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":23,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}}}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Edge"},"name":"query - 10"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let count_per_controller = InsightsMetrics
| where Name == "http_request_duration_seconds_count"
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).action)
| extend code_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).code)
| extend controller_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).controller)
| extend method_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).method)
| where controller_ <> "Heartbeat" 
| project TimeGenerated, Name, controller_, action_, code_, method_, Val
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by controller_, action_, method_, code_
| summarize RecordCount = sum(Val) by Controller = controller_;
count_per_controller","size":4,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Controller Hits","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"Applications","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"Publish","color":"turquoise"},{"seriesName":"Other","color":"gray"},{"seriesName":"Browse","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"Discovery","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"Publishers","color":"magenta"},{"seriesName":"Workers","color":"yellow"}]}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Service"},"name":"query - 17"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InsightsMetrics
| where Name == "http_request_duration_seconds_count"
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).action)
| extend code_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).code)
| extend controller_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).controller)
| extend method_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).method)
| where code_ <> "0" and controller_ <> "Heartbeat"
| project TimeGenerated, Name, controller_, action_, code_, method_, Val
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by controller_, action_, method_, code_
| summarize RequestCount = sum(Val) by HttpCode = code_
| render piechart ;","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Http Response Codes","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"200","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"204","color":"turquoise"},{"seriesName":"404","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"500","color":"blueDark"}],"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}}}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Service"},"name":"query - 18"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let max_count_per_method = InsightsMetrics 
| where Name == "http_request_duration_seconds_count"
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).action)
| extend code_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).code)
| extend controller_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).controller)
| extend method_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).method)
| where controller_ <> "Heartbeat"
| project TimeGenerated, m = strcat(controller_,":" ,action_), Val
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by m;
let max_duration_per_method =InsightsMetrics 
| where Name == "http_request_duration_seconds"
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).action)
| extend code_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).code)
| extend controller_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).controller)
| extend method_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).method)
| extend le_ = tostring(parse_json(Tags).le)
| where controller_ <> "Heartbeat" and le_ != "+Inf"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by controller_, action_ , le_
| project TimeGenerated, m = strcat(controller_,":" , action_), Val, le_;
max_duration_per_method
| join kind=leftouter max_count_per_method on m
| project TimeGenerated, m, Val, mVal = Val1, le_
| extend percent_of_messages = todouble(Val) * 100 / toint(mVal)
| where percent_of_messages < 100 and percent_of_messages > 30
| project percent_of_messages, rt_ms = todouble(le_) * 1000, API = m , a = strcat(percent_of_messages, m) 
| partition by a ( top 1 by rt_ms asc) 
| project API, rt_ms, percent_of_messages
| sort by API, percent_of_messages desc;

","size":4,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Request Duration (Percentiles)","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","crossComponentResources":["<appinsights_resource_id>"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"showBorder":false,"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"performanceBucket","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"AppInsights"},"name":"query - 17"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"traces
| where customDimensions.MessageTemplate startswith "successfully processed"
| parse message with * "processed " record_count " records" *
| project timestamp, records = toint(record_count)
| summarize ["total records"] = sum(records) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart ","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"CDM : Number of records processed and written as CDM","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","crossComponentResources":["<appinsights_resource_id>"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"AppInsights"},"name":"query - 18"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"traces
| where customDimensions.MessageTemplate startswith "Finished writing CDM data records"
| parse message with * "took " time_taken ")" *
| project timestamp, t = totimespan(time_taken)/ time(1s)
| summarize ["time(sec)"] = avg(t) by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart ","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"CDM: Time taken to write CDM data records","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","crossComponentResources":["<appinsights_resource_id>"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"AppInsights"},"name":"query - 19"}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":[],"fromTemplateId":"community-Workbooks/View Designer/Tabbed"}
